name: hyper-and-non-linear-in-real-time-run-time
description: a short free visual poetry publication made with Google Charts
author: Tomer Lichtash

scripts.dev: JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -d dev
scripts.clean: bundle exec jekyll clean && bundle exec jekyll clean -d dev
scripts.dist: JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build -d docs --incremental --verbose && versiony minor
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build && git push github master
